Sequence Information.Peptide Name: StomoxynZH1 (natural AMPs; insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; more AMPs?)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is most similar (42.8%) toinsect Stomoxyn. Mol Formula: C268H443N73O83S2; Mol Wt: 6119.047; GRAVY: 0.949;Activity: Antibacterial activity was tested using the recombinant fusion protein with thioredoxin Trx-stomoxynZH1. Active against E. coli (MIC 15-30 ug/ml) and S. aureus (MIC 27-54 ug/ml).  There are additional peptides reported without activity data yet.
Literature Information.Author: Elhag O, Zhou D, Song Q, et al.2017, China, Asia
Literature Information.Title: Screening, Expression, Purification and Functional Characterization of Novel Antimicrobial Peptide Genes From Hermetia Illucens (L.)
